name: Blood Red Reclamation
description:
(Red Dead Redemption if it was a Nintendo 64 Game) P.S Ran out of time

Survive at long as possible 

enemies attack in wave intervals play and complete shooting range for bonus points

WASD for movement

SPACE -Jump

E - mount/exit from horse

Mouse - Camera rotation

Left Mouse - Shoot

Right mouse - Aim

Tab - toggle slow motion(while off horse)
